content: the helena cowl calls for soft cotton yarn and uses a pretty stitch pattern making it perfect for a light spring cowl this pattern is available for free on my blog and includes written instructions and links to helpful tutorials size finished cowl measures approximately 7 5 inches tall and 28 inches around instructions are provided to help you adjust the pattern to be larger or smaller as you desire materials size h 5 mm crochet hook worsted weight cotton yarn #4 i love this cotton approximately 150 yards i would love to see your helena cowls tag me on instagram @craftsbysarahliz so i can see your work i hope you enjoy my pattern your support of my small business is truly appreciated *permissions* - you are free to sell what you make from this pattern i would appreciate links back to my blog ravelry or etsy shop to credit me as the designer - you may not use my photos - you may not sell this pattern or any part of this pattern distribute it or claim it as your own © 2020 sarah gross - crafts by sarah liz
